long_description: Enhance your visibility with the BikeGlow Safety Light, which wraps around your bike to deliver lightweight, dependable on-bike lighting that's visible from all angles. 10 ft. flexible light tube uses electroluminescent technology and features bright colors for increased visibility. 3 modes let you customize the light-choose between steady, slow flashing, and fast flashing modes. Light attaches by wrapping around frame tubing and secures tightly with included attachment ties; 3-1/2" x 1-1/4" power unit attaches to bike with included strap. BikeGlow Safety Light is lightweight and secure enough to be left on your bike so you have safety lighting always at the ready. Waterproof to 3m, the sturdy construction ensures dependable use, even in inclement conditions. Batteries are not included (runs on 2 AA batteries). The BikeGlow Safety Light is available in a variety of colors to suit your preferences.
